choices: Try to explore or find a way out
11.content:

Perhaps but the last concrete thing you remember is talking to your folks about college. It was a strange conversation to have with them, as they've been somewhat distant to you most of your life. They've been good providers, but hard to say great parents.

Your eyes open a bit to a bright fluorescent light. It's soft hum immediately bothers you as you rub your eyes awake. You jolt up a bit as a thin finger accidentally pokes your eye a bit....something feels terribly off. Sitting up you lean forward a bit as something is pulling you down. It's then you notice that you're in a completely enclosed space...mirrors surround you and the only person you see is female. She sort of looks like you...in a weird way.

It's then you look down, long strands of hair cover obviously breasts pushing from your chest. They're heavy, likely around C-D range and make you lean forward a bit. You're naked, and shiver as the cool air registers with you. Your skin is tight, and your legs long, hips a bit wide, and waist thin. info.brief_description: Via a strange means, a selective group has added you to their ranks of swapped humans.
info.description:
There are many secret societies in the world, some more secretive than others. Through ancient arts of divinity, one of them has found that you, a troubled soul with a very mundane and somewhat depressing life, would be better as the opposite side, you just don't know it yet! This will have both female to male and male to female options so both sides can get in on the fun.

Some ground rules:
Keep things in context of whatever gender/age you choose
Since it's an interactive, try to use the second person "you" form. Not ironclad but to keep things consistant
Full sentences, words, paragraphs....that really shouldn't be necessary but it is the internet after all.
